mapper.select: select count(*) from p_qna where category = #{category}
mapper.insert: insert into p_qna(num,category,writer,title,content,filename,filesize,passwd,ref,re_step,re_level,picture) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from p_qna),#{category}, #{writer},#{title}, #{content},#{filename},#{filesize},#{passwd}, (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from p_qna) ,1,0,#{picture})
mapper.update: update p_qna set review_count=review_count+1 where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select passwd from p_qna where num=#{num} and passwd=#{passwd}
mapper.insert: insert into p_qna (num,writer,title,passwd,category,ref ,re_step,re_level,content,filename,filesize,picture) values ( (select nvl(max(num)+1,1) from p_qna) ,#{writer},#{title}, #{passwd}, #{category} , #{ref}, #{re_step}, #{re_level} , #{content}, #{filename}, #{filesize}, #{picture} )
mapper.update: update p_qna set show='n' where num=#{num}
